body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Ethan Phillips and the customer's name is Lisa Moore.  The conversation is about Accounting Eagles (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Ethan Phillips, and I represent Accounting Eagles. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Ethan, my name is Lisa Moore. I'm calling about some billing issues I've encountered.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Lisa. I understand how billing issues can be quite frustrating. Can you please provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my account number is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. And could you also confirm your zip code for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my zip code is nine eight seven six five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you, Lisa. Let me take a look at your account and see what the issue might be.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Ethan. I got a bill that seems higher than usual, and I'm quite worried about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand your concern. I will do my best to clarify this billing discrepancy for you right now.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, that would be very helpful!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It looks like I have all the information I need. Thank you for your time today, Lisa. If you have any further questions, don't hesitate to reach out.
